full_summary:
# COVID-19 Vaccine Tender Announcement

## Title
RFP for MMR, MMRV and Varicella Vaccines

## Reference Information
*   Reference Number: WS4430024899-Doc4430102380
*   Solicitation Number: WS4430024899
*   Tender Closing Date: February 28, 2024, at 2:00 p.m. EST (14:00:00)

## Overview
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites sealed bids from qualified suppliers for the procurement of MMR, MMRV, and Varicella vaccines under the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA).

## Key Highlights

*   This tender is open to bidders worldwide under Canada's Trade Agreements, including the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP).
*   The procurement category is Goods and Services (GD), and the tendering method is competitive, with open bidding.
*   The selection criterion is the lowest price.

## Contracting Entity and End User

*   Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   End User: PSPC

## Contact Information

*   Contact Person: Joy, Sharon
*   Email: sharon.joy@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

## Notice URL
[https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18736867?extsite=MTg3MzY4NjdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18736867?extsite=MTg3MzY4NjdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

## UNSPSC Classification
Drugs and Pharmaceutical Products (51000000)

## Trade Agreements Eligibility
This tender is open to bidders under the following trade agreements:

*   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
*   Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
*   Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada
